name: Fuller Life
description:
The Fuller Life is an employee wellbeing company with 2 decades of experience serving 100+ customers like ITC, Kotak, Ford, and Embassy. We also are the people behind the Runners for Life and Corporate Health Summit.

Our flagship offering is Wellbeing on the Web (WoW) for companies, which covers physical, financial, emotional, and social wellbeing for companies as small as 25 to 1 lakh people.
features: 1-to-1 consultations with counsellors, doctors and dietitians
Headline: India’s one-stop holistic corporate wellbeing program for employees
ShortDescription: India’s one-stop holistic corporate wellbeing program for employees

Highlights.name: Pioneers
Highlights.description: We have supported health and wellbeing programs for employees of most evolved companies

Highlights.name: Services
Highlights.description: We have worked with Fortune 500 companies across all wellbeing offerings

Highlights.name: Vantage point
Highlights.description: We work across industries, sizes of companies and workforce types

enhanced_description: Fuller Life offers India's one-stop holistic corporate wellbeing program, Wellbeing on the Web (WoW), designed for employees. With two decades of experience, Fuller Life has served over 100 customers, including Fortune 500 companies like ITC, Kotak, Ford, and Embassy, showcasing their ability to support health and wellbeing programs for evolved organizations across various industries, company sizes, and workforce types. The program comprehensively covers physical, financial, emotional, and social wellbeing for companies ranging from 25 to 1 lakh employees. Fuller Life is also known for organizing events like Runners for Life and the Corporate Health Summit.
key_use_cases: Providing holistic employee wellbeing support (physical, financial, emotional, social)
Tracking employee engagement and wellbeing program effectiveness through analytics
Facilitating regular branded communication on wellbeing topics
Offering confidential 1-to-1 consultations with counsellors, doctors, and dietitians
competitive_advantages: Two decades of experience in the employee wellbeing sector
Proven track record with over 100 established customers, including Fortune 500 companies
Pioneering expertise in corporate health and wellbeing programs
Holistic coverage of physical, financial, emotional, and social wellbeing
Versatility to serve companies across diverse industries, sizes, and workforce types
Engagement with broader wellness ecosystem through events like Runners for Life and Corporate Health Summit
scalability_features: Capable of serving small, large, and global enterprises
